metadata.synopsis: A druid guarding the entrance to the inner part of a sacred druid grove. He curtly warns the player to behave.

0.speaker: Mino
0.text: Few outsiders are allowed in here - be respectful and do not interfere.
0.context: NodeContext: 'tread on eggshells while you're here - or else.'

1.speaker: Mino
1.text: See to your business here quickly - then leave.
1.context: NodeContext: 'tread on eggshells while you're here - or else.'

2.speaker: Mino
2.text: Remember, outsider - you are tolerated more than you are welcome.
2.context: NodeContext: The atmosphere in the grove is slightly less tense when this line is spoken, but it's not exactly friendly either.

3.speaker: Mino
3.text: The Rite of Thorns has ceased; it seems you will be allowed to stay - but behave.
3.context: NodeContext: The atmosphere in the grove is slightly less tense when this line is spoken, but it's not exactly friendly either.
